verses.verse: ( Judgment on Israel’s Neighbors) ( 300 12:14-17 ) דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> diḇ·rê [These are] the words עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> ‘ā·mō·ws of Amos, אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- who הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> hā·yāh was בַנֹּקְדִ֖ים <WH5349> ḇan·nō·qə·ḏîm among the sheepherders ( Or sheep breeders) מִתְּק֑וֹעַ <WH8620> mit·tə·qō·w·a‘ of Tekoa — אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ’ă·šer what חָזָ֨ה <WH2372> ḥā·zāh he saw עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel בִּימֵ֣י׀ <WH3117> bî·mê in the days עֻזִיָּ֣ה <WH5818> ʿu·zī·yå̄h [when] Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> me·leḵ- [was] king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah וּבִימֵ֞י <WH3117> ū·ḇî·mê ... יָרָבְעָ֤ם <WH3379> yā·rā·ḇə·‘ām and Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son יוֹאָשׁ֙ <WH3101> yō·w·’āš of Jehoash ( Hebrew Joash, a variant of Jehoash) מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ [was] king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel. שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <WH8141> šə·nā·ṯa·yim two years ( Or during the two years) לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before הָרָֽעַשׁ׃ <WH7494> hā·rā·‘aš the earthquake,

וַיֹּאמַ֓ר׀ <WH559> way·yō·mar He said: יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh “ The LORD מִצִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> mi·ṣī·yōn from Zion יִשְׁאָ֔ג <WH7580> yiš·’āḡ roars וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ū·mî·rū·šā·lim from Jerusalem; יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên and raises קוֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> qō·w·lōw His voice וְאָֽבְלוּ֙ <WH56> wə·’ā·ḇə·lū mourn, נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> nə·’ō·wṯ the pastures הָרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> hā·rō·‘îm of the shepherds וְיָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> wə·yā·ḇêš withers. ” רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rōš and the summit הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃פ <WH3760> hak·kar·mel of Carmel

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- “ For שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> šə·lō·šāh three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> piš·‘ê transgressions דַמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> ḏam·me·śeq of Damascus, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- even אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ’ar·bā·‘āh four, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> ’ă·šî·ḇen·nū revoke [My judgment], ( Or I will not revoke the punishment; Hebrew I will not revoke it; also in verses 6, 9, 11, and 13) עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because דּוּשָׁ֛ם <WH1758> dū·šām they threshed בַּחֲרֻצ֥וֹת <WH2742> ba·ḥă·ru·ṣō·wṯ with sledges הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> hab·bar·zel of iron. אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> hag·gil·‘āḏ Gilead

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> wə·šil·laḥ·tî So I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ’êš fire בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> bə·ḇêṯ upon the house חֲזָאֵ֑ל <WH2371> ḥă·zā·’êl of Hazael וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵə·lāh to consume אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> ’ar·mə·nō·wṯ the citadels בֶּן־ <WH1130> ben- of הֲדָֽד׃ <WH1130> hă·ḏāḏ Ben-hadad.

וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <WH7665> wə·šā·ḇar·tî I will break down בְּרִ֣יחַ <WH1280> bə·rî·aḥ the gates דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> dam·me·śeq of Damascus; וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> wə·hiḵ·rat·tî I will cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> yō·wō·šêḇ the ruler ( Or the inhabitants) מִבִּקְעַת־ <WH1237> mib·biq·‘aṯ- of the Valley of Aven ( Aven means wickedness.) אָ֔וֶן <WH206> ’ā·wen ... וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <WH8551> wə·ṯō·w·mêḵ and the one who wields שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> šê·ḇeṭ the scepter מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1040> mib·bêṯ in Beth-eden עֶ֑דֶן <WH1040> ‘e·ḏen .... וְגָל֧וּ <WH1540> wə·ḡā·lū will be exiled עַם־ <WH5971> ‘am- The people אֲרָ֛ם <WH758> ’ă·rām of Aram קִ֖ירָה <WH7024> qî·rāh to Kir, ” אָמַ֥ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says יְהוָֽה׃פ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD.

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- “ For שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> šə·lō·šāh three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> piš·‘ê transgressions עַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> ‘az·zāh of Gaza, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- even אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ’ar·bā·‘āh four, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> ’ă·šî·ḇen·nū revoke [My judgment], עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because הַגְלוֹתָ֛ם <WH1540> haḡ·lō·w·ṯām they exiled גָּל֥וּת <WH1546> gā·lūṯ population, שְׁלֵמָ֖ה <WH8003> šə·lê·māh a whole לְהַסְגִּ֥יר <WH5462> lə·has·gîr delivering [them] up לֶאֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> le·’ĕ·ḏō·wm to Edom.

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> wə·šil·laḥ·tî So I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ’êš fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> bə·ḥō·w·maṯ upon the walls עַזָּ֑ה <WH5804> ‘az·zāh of Gaza, וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵə·lāh to consume אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH759> ’ar·mə·nō·ṯe·hā its citadels.

וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> wə·hiḵ·rat·tî I will cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> yō·wō·šêḇ the ruler מֵֽאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <WH795> mê·’aš·dō·wḏ of Ashdod וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <WH8551> wə·ṯō·w·mêḵ and the one who wields שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> šê·ḇeṭ the scepter מֵֽאַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <WH831> mê·’aš·qə·lō·wn in Ashkelon. וַהֲשִׁיב֨וֹתִי <WH7725> wa·hă·šî·ḇō·w·ṯî I will turn יָדִ֜י <WH3027> yā·ḏî My hand עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- against עֶקְר֗וֹן <WH6138> ‘eq·rō·wn Ekron, וְאָֽבְדוּ֙ <WH6> wə·’ā·ḇə·ḏū will perish, ” שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> šə·’ê·rîṯ and the remnant פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pə·liš·tîm of the Philistines אָמַ֖ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִֽה׃פ <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD.

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- “ For שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> šə·lō·šāh three פִּשְׁעֵי־ <WH6588> piš·‘ê- transgressions צֹ֔ר <WH6865> ṣōr of Tyre, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- even אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ’ar·bā·‘āh four, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> ’ă·šî·ḇen·nū revoke [My judgment], עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because הַסְגִּירָ֞ם <WH5462> has·gî·rām they delivered up גָּל֤וּת <WH1546> gā·lūṯ congregation of exiles שְׁלֵמָה֙ <WH8003> šə·lê·māh a whole לֶאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> le·’ĕ·ḏō·wm to Edom וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō and broke זָכְר֖וּ <WH2142> zā·ḵə·rū ... בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> bə·rîṯ a covenant אַחִֽים׃ <WH251> ’a·ḥîm of brotherhood.

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> wə·šil·laḥ·tî So I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ’êš fire בְּח֣וֹמַת <WH2346> bə·ḥō·w·maṯ upon the walls צֹ֑ר <WH6865> ṣōr of Tyre וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵə·lāh to consume אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃פ <WH759> ’ar·mə·nō·ṯe·hā its citadels. ”

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- “ For שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> šə·lō·šāh three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> piš·‘ê transgressions אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> ’ĕ·ḏō·wm of Edom, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- even אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ’ar·bā·‘āh four, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> ’ă·šî·ḇen·nū revoke [My judgment], עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because רָדְפ֨וֹ <WH7291> rā·ḏə·p̄ōw he pursued בַחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> ḇa·ḥe·reḇ with the sword אָחִיו֙ <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw his brother וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> wə·ši·ḥêṯ and stifled רַחֲמָ֔יו <WH7356> ra·ḥă·māw all compassion; וַיִּטְרֹ֤ף <WH2963> way·yiṭ·rōp̄ raged לָעַד֙ <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ continually, אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> ’ap·pōw his anger וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <WH5678> wə·‘eḇ·rā·ṯōw and his fury שְׁמָ֥רָה <WH8104> šə·mā·rāh flamed נֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> ne·ṣaḥ incessantly.

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> wə·šil·laḥ·tî So I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ’êš fire בְּתֵימָ֑ן <WH8487> bə·ṯê·mān upon Teman וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵə·lāh to consume אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> ’ar·mə·nō·wṯ the citadels בָּצְרָֽה׃פ <WH1224> bāṣ·rāh of Bozrah. ”

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> kōh This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- “ For שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> šə·lō·šāh three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> piš·‘ê transgressions בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- of the Ammonites עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> ‘am·mō·wn ..., וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- even אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> ’ar·bā·‘āh four, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> ’ă·šî·ḇen·nū revoke [My judgment], עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- because בִּקְעָם֙ <WH1234> biq·‘ām they ripped open הָר֣וֹת <WH2030> hā·rō·wṯ the pregnant הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> hag·gil·‘āḏ women of Gilead לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an in order to הַרְחִ֥יב <WH7337> har·ḥîḇ enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> gə·ḇū·lām their territory.

וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <WH3341> wə·hiṣ·ṣat·tî So I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> ’êš a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> bə·ḥō·w·maṯ in the walls רַבָּ֔ה <WH7237> rab·bāh of Rabbah וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> wə·’ā·ḵə·lāh to consume אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH759> ’ar·mə·nō·w·ṯe·hā its citadels בִּתְרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> biṯ·rū·‘āh amid war cries בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm on the day מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> mil·ḥā·māh of battle בְּסַ֖עַר <WH5591> bə·sa·‘ar and a violent wind בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm on the day סוּפָֽה <WH5492> sū·p̄å̄h of tempest.

וְהָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> wə·hā·laḵ will go מַלְכָּ֖ם <WH4428> mal·kām Their king בַּגּוֹלָ֑ה <WH1473> bag·gō·w·lāh into exile — ( Possibly Milcom will go into exile; Milcom, also called Molech, was god of the Ammonites; see and .) ה֧וּא <WH1931> hū he וְשָׂרָ֛יו <WH8269> wə·śā·rāw and his princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> yaḥ·dāw together, ” אָמַ֥ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says יְהוָֽה׃פ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD.
